answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello Diane,
Many local governments recognize their outstanding citizens.  One heartwarming story came from a local teen earning her Girl Scout gold star:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3234/City_Recognizes_Teen_for_Community_Service
One document on describes how some local governments recognize their citizens for their volunteer service:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/7776/Managing_Volunteers_in_a_City
I hope these help you find ideas for recognizing individuals or groups.

author: Diane Vollmer
text: Does anyone have procedrues for county commissions to recognize individuals or groups for involvement within their community?
title: Citizen Recognitions
